column2: HOW LONG THERAPY TAKES TO SHOW RESULTS
column5: Any counseling begins with your therapist understanding you better and gaining perspective about your personality preferences#Comma needs#Comma and the difficulties you are facing. Each counseling session lasts for around 60 minutes and the frequency of sessions will be best determined by your therapist based upon your personality and the severity of your issue.

Therapy is the oppurtunity to discuss your thoughts and feelings about any issue that you face in everyday life that you may wish to explore and understand better in a professional and confidential setting.
